name: Real Sniper Shooter
description:
Real Sniper Shooter is an amazing and thriller shooting game.
Complete the mission as per instruction and own a big money.
Kill some criminals to make the world better place.

How To Play:
You will award 20 missions and to let them finish successfully.
Try to aim correctly and shoot the enemy.
User can zoom in via telescope to kill its enemy easily

How to achieve successful missions:
Avoid to kill wrong person
Read carefully the mission description
Use Sniper’s telescope to shoot your aim

Game Features:
Amazing graphics,Amazing sound
Beautiful city view with 3d view.
Use of Internet is not compulsory

Play and let your friends and family play this game and challenge your friend with your highest score.
For any suggestion/feedback feel free to contact us at xertzgamestudio@gmail.com
